name: Paintgrounds SIM
description:
The dawn of the Internet Age is at hand, and software giant Megasoft has published the  revolutionary new Megasoft Paint Portal, where anyone can show off their works of art to the whole world.

Become a master of Megasoft Paint, and unleash your boundless creativity on the world!

(Or, y'know, maybe do those things after the game is completed. Currently you can't do a whole lot. Although you can paint some stuff, if you want.)

Originally made for the MS Paint 2021 game jam. Inspired very heavily by Newgrounds SIM, by Afro-Ninja.
